channel.title: Comments on: ‘Second Life’ membership now free

item.title: By: Saccia
item.dc:creator: Saccia
item.description: Wierd. I've never understood what Second Life was about or what the point was. It seems like a MMORPG minus the ninja-looting, epic-farming, item-fighting, guild-idioting, level-grinding, bot-farming, loot-whoring, etc. Seems like a chat room.... hell, perhaps that is the perfect MMO. :-P
item.content:encoded: Wierd. I’ve never understood what Second Life was about or what the point was. It seems like a MMORPG minus the ninja-looting, epic-farming, item-fighting, guild-idioting, level-grinding, bot-farming, loot-whoring, etc. Seems like a chat room…. hell, perhaps that is the perfect MMO. ðŸ˜›
